text iq:
https://www.qualtrics.com/support/survey-platform/data-and-analysis-module/text-iq/text-iq-functionality/ Text iQ is a tool for analyzing feedback that lets you assign topics and perform sentiment analysis. To use it, upload data and select fields. After going into editing mode, you can change topics, sentiments, etc. Lemmatization and spell check help tag responses accurately. Dataset updates take time, but there are best practices for using Text iQ effectively.https://www.qualtrics.com/support/survey-platform/data-and-analysis-module/text-iq/topics-in-text-iq/ 👥 Use Topics in Text iQ to tag feedback and identify common themes. 
⚙️ Create topics with search queries that can automatically update as new responses are added. 
🔍 Use exact operators and parentheses for more complex searches. 
💡 Qualtrics offers Related Terms and recommended topics based on frequently appearing feedback terms. 
🗂️ Topics can be nested up to 5 levels and have queries that inherit from their ancestors. 
📥 Import pre-built topics or export and import your own topics. 
💼 Check out Qualtrics XM Solutions for specialized topic packages. https://www.qualtrics.com/support/survey-platform/data-and-analysis-module/text-iq/sentiment-analysis/ Qualtrics Text iQ assigns sentiment score (-2 to +2) based on response and question text. Very negative and positive labels indicate the strongest sentiment. Batch analysis is used to improve the model. Topic sentiment is calculated for each query and can vary. Numeric value is assigned to each sentiment. Model available in multiple languages. Employee Journey Analytics: combine data from multiple projects to analyze employee experience. https://www.qualtrics.com/support/survey-platform/data-and-analysis-module/text-iq/widgets-in-text-iq/ 📊Text iQ has widgets: bubble (sentiment breakdown), sentiment/topic change, topic coverage change, and word cloud. Widgets available in summary mode, or on CX dashboard (Text iQ bubble chart). Click bubbles for more info, narrow down topics in View dropdown. Sentiment change compared across 2 time periods, topic coverage computed as % of comments covered by each topic. Word cloud lists 50 most frequent words in text responses. Cannot change word cloud color. Other Qualtrics widgets for survey response, employee journey analysis, supply continuity, digital commerce. https://www.qualtrics.com/support/vocalize/dashboard-settings-cx/text-analysis-cx/ Text iQ in Dashboards performs extensive text analysis, sentiment labeling, and topic analysis. It is available in CX/brand/pulse dashboards and can be found in settings or via the Text iQ button. Map text entries as Open Text in Dashboard Data Settings. Text iQ has the same capabilities in the survey platform. Topics and sentiments will map automatically and can be renamed. Use "-Topics" or "-Sentiment" to add topics or sentiments as sources, metric, or dimensions. Use Text iQ Table/Bubble widgets for CX Dashboards. Translation and sentiment analysis also available.

website intercept:
https://www.qualtrics.com/support/website-app-feedback/getting-started-with-website-app-feedback/step-4-setting-up-your-intercept/ To create an intercept, choose a creative and target. Use logic to control when creatives appear, based on conditions like visitor location or device. You'll need to work with your IT team to select a PGP encryption software such as PGP Tool, GPG Tools, or GPG utility. When setting up SFTP settings, select 'Encrypt files using PGP' and paste the public key. For importing, select 'Decrypt files before importing using PGP' and download the public key to provide to your IT team. Similar steps apply for contact/employee directory automation.
